BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.label: Psycher
BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.description: An ancient symbol from Earth commonly seen among the various Psycher groups, often representing the mind's eye.

BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.label: Crimson Guard Commander Corp
BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.description: A symbol worn proud from the Zhukhovsky Military Graduates, proud members of the party and great leaders of the revolution of the sword.
